src:
Džejms Bel stiže u Partizan
Crno-beli već par meseci traže igrača njegovog kalibra

01 Nov 2019

Posle Nemanje Gordića, Partizan bće dovesti još jednog člana prošlosezonske ekipe Budućnosti iz Podgorice. Kako piše crnogorski CdM, Džejms Bel je nadomak crno-belog dresa. A potom je i Ostoja Mijailović za Sport Klub potvrdio da će ovaj posao biti realizovan.
U pitanju je 27-godišnji američki bek, koji je dres Podgoričana nosio od kraja 2018. pa sve do kraja crnogorskog šampionata. 
Prvi deo prošle sezone proveo je u Cedeviti dok je ona još nastupala u Zagrebu, tako da sa te strane Belu ne bi trebalo mnogo da se navikne na ABA ligu i to jeste prednost ovog igrača koji je profil kakav je potreban ovom sastavu crno-belih.



Bel je u karijeri imao zapaženu epizodu u Darušafaki, a igrao je i za Hapoel Holon, Nansi i Kremonu, u kojoj je 2014. počeo profesionalnu karijeru posle diplomiranja na koledžu Vilanova.
Partizan je sjajno startovao u Evrokupu, gde je jedini neporaženi tim nakon pete runde, dok u regionalnoj ABA ligi ima učinak 2-2.
Da li je Bel igrač koji će dodatno podići kvalitet crno-belih pred nastavak sezone? Inače, Bel se uklapa u priču po kojoj Partizan već dugo traži igrača koji može da igra na pozicijama tri i dva, a videćemo da će ovo povući nove promene u sastavu crno-belih.






FOTO: MN Press
text:
James Bell arrives in Partizan
Black and whites have been looking for a player of his caliber for several months now

01 Nov 2019

After Nemanja Gordic, Partizan will bring another member of last season's Buducnost team from Podgorica. As Montenegrin CdM writes, James Bell is close to a black and white jersey. And then Ostoja Mijailovic for Sport Club confirmed that this deal would be realized.
It is a 27-year-old American back who wore a Podgorican jersey from the end of 2018 until the end of the Montenegrin championship.
She spent the first part of last season in Cedevita while she was still playing in Zagreb, so on that side Bellew would not have to get used to the ABA league and that is the advantage of this player who has the profile required by this group of black and whites.



Bell had a notable episode at Darushafaka in his career and also played for Hapoel Holon, Nancy and Cremona, in which he began his professional career in 2014 after graduating from Vilanova College.
Partizan made a great start at Eurocup, where it is the only undefeated team after the fifth round, while in the regional ABA league it has a performance of 2-2.
Is Bel a player who will further enhance the quality of black and whites before the season goes on? By the way, Bell fits into the story that Partizan has long been looking for a player who can play in positions three and two, and we will see that this will bring about new changes in the composition of black and whites.






PHOTO: MN Press
